remarks: The value of a function that is expressed as an ordered pair abstraction.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fvopab5.1 $e |- F = { <. x , y >. | ph } $.
fvopab5.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
fvopab5 $p |- ( A e. V -> ( F ` A ) = ( iota y ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ps x $.
